metadata.title: AusCtisExportTaggedIndicators
metadata.description:
This playbook gets triggered every hour and perform the following actions:
 1. Get all the threat intelligence indicators from Microsoft Sentinel Workspace with given tag.
 2. Filter all the indicators whose export in not completed.
 3. Export the indicators to provided TAXII server.
prerequisites: 1. Have TAXII Server Url, Collection ID, Username and Password handy before the deployment of the Playbook

2. Tag the indicators that need to be exported, by default this playbook exports the indicators with tag 'ACSC Export', this can be changes during the deployment of playbook. Details on how to tag can be found [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/understand-threat-intelligence#view-and-manage-your-threat-indicators)
postDeployment: This playbook needs contributor role on Log Analytics, to read and update threat indicator tags. 1. Go to Log Analytics Workspace resource --> 2. Select Access control (IAM) tab -->3. Add role assignments --> 4. Select Contributor role --> 5. In the Members tab choose 'Assign access to' Managed Identity --> 6. Click on 'Select members' --> 7. Provide correct Subscription and Managed Identity  --> 8. Provide the playbook name in 'Search by name' textbox --> 9. Select the correct identity and click on Select --> 10. Click on 'Review + assign'

metadata.description: Enter unique identifier for your organization. This will be used to create unique object IDs for the bundle. This should be a UUID in the format of xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx.
Enter value for Tag for indicators to be exported
Enter value for Tag for indicator export completion
Enter value for Default TLP Label

Set_variable_with_STIX_bundle_JSON.description: Union of Indicators to remove duplicate TLP MarkingRefObjs

inputs.where: @contains(item()?['properties']?['threatIntelligenceTags'], parameters('Tag for indicators to be exported'))

Add_description_to_GroupingObjs_Array.description: descirption later to be used in Grouping

Append_IndicatorId_to_array_GroupingObj.description: Store IndicatorID, later to be used for Grouping

Append_confidence_score_to_array_Groupin.description: confidence score later to be used in Grouping

Append_IncidentTag_to_array_GroupingObjs.description: Store IncidentID, later to be used for Grouping

Append_'NoIncident'_to_array_GroupingObj.description: Append 'NoIncident' if IncidentID is not present

inputs.where: @not(equals(parameters('Tag for indicators to be exported'), item()))

Append_MarkingRefObjID_to_array_AllMarki.description: This array is used in Identity Object creation.

Append_MarkingRefObjID_to_array_Grouping.description: Store MarkingRefObjID, later to be used for Grouping

body.keywords: tags:"@{parameters('Tag for indicators to be exported')}"

Initialize_array_IncidentIDLabelsForGrou.description: Array stores all the combinations of IndicatorId, IncidentId and MarkingRefObj as ';' concatenated string

Initialize_array_TempIncidentIdArray.description: Array to store IncidentId which grouping is created
